message.body: dude. sorry i was in such a bitchy mood today.
You were? I didn't notice anything.
oh, okay. good. haha.
I'm sorry I've been so busy recently.
I want to hang out. I do.
ummm. you definitely don't need to apologize. we just saw each other last...
ahem, *last week
sooo besides doing my entire project in 3 hrs, i also did like 6 contact sheets. like how proud are you?
I'm like really really proud. That's a crazy amount of work.
woooo! thanks. even though it might all be really shitty. i was getting slack with my developing. i'm still satisfied.
I'm sure it's not shitty. Your stuff is good.
hopefully! i'm excited to see yours.
Hey actually when are you free in the next few days?
ummm. after 7 tonight, noon to 5 tomorrow, and after like 8 or 9 on friday. haha. this week is weird.
Haha ok. I'll keep that in mind. Looking forward to seeing you.
hahaha, is it wrong if i'm still taking pictures with that mirror fragment?
Id say that's right.
And very artsy
SO artsy. like everything we do.
Revisioning a past motif.
thank you for giving me the perfect excuse, haha. since i can't really just say "because it's fun"
Do you know which option you're doing for the next assignment?
haven't decided yet. probably the place one. you?
Same. I think I have an idea, but I need you to honestly tell me if its stupid.
tell me! :)
My car. I'm thinking I can bring it different places and I could take pictures inside it, through it, from it, of it, etc.
that's actually really clever!
Ok. You're sure it's not like, oh, he likes cars so he's taking a lot of pictures of his car
if you don't, like, put thought into it, maybe. but i think it could be done well.
I think it's worth exploring.
i agree! i mean, we have to have 20 rolls eventually anyway...
sooo when are we hanging out again?
How about tomorrow night?
i can probably wait til then. :)
Haha probably?
the stress of this week is making me, um, really wanting to see you... to put it politely.
Haha I like to hear that. I'm looking forward to it.
